"Shubenacadie Watershed Environmental Protection Society - Soldier and Miller Lakes Monitoring Program (SWEPS)" (dataset). 2.0.0. DataStream. https://doi.org/10.25976/3tt9-gh44.</gco:CharacterString>

                            </gmd:organisationName>
                            <gmd:role>

                            </gmd:organisationName>
                            <gmd:role>

            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>Our concern over the Soldiers/Miller Lakes area arose from the Synoptic Survey of 2000 which identified increasing nutrients in both of these lakes. The Halifax Water sewage treatment facility in the Aerotech Park feeds into Soldiers Lake. Following is a link to the survey. http://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/Library/328834.pdf   Graphs and verbiage starting at page 32 indicate the problems with increasing ammonia, chlorophyll a and phosphorous. In addition to the point source inputs we will be setting stations to utilize the secchi disc during our testing.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>
            <gmd:credit gco:nilReason="missing"/>

                <gmd:MD_ProgressCode

                codeListValue="onGoing">onGoing</gmd:MD_ProgressCode>

                            </gmd:westBoundLongitude>
                            <gmd:eastBoundLongitude>

                            </gmd:eastBoundLongitude>

                            </gmd:southBoundLatitude>

fr: résultats sur la qualité de l'eau

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-3tt9-gh44
notes: Our concern over the Soldiers/Miller Lakes area arose from the Synoptic Survey of 2000 which identified increasing nutrients in both of these lakes. The Halifax Water sewage treatment facility in the Aerotech Park feeds into Soldiers Lake. Following is a link to the survey. http://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/Library/328834.pdf   Graphs and verbiage starting at page 32 indicate the problems with increasing ammonia, chlorophyll a and phosphorous. In addition to the point source inputs we will be setting stations to utilize the secchi disc during our testing.

notes_translated.en: Our concern over the Soldiers/Miller Lakes area arose from the Synoptic Survey of 2000 which identified increasing nutrients in both of these lakes. The Halifax Water sewage treatment facility in the Aerotech Park feeds into Soldiers Lake. Following is a link to the survey. http://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/Library/328834.pdf   Graphs and verbiage starting at page 32 indicate the problems with increasing ammonia, chlorophyll a and phosphorous. In addition to the point source inputs we will be setting stations to utilize the secchi disc during our testing.
notes_translated.fr: Nos préoccupations concernant la région des lacs Soldiers/Miller découlaient de l'étude synoptique de 2000 qui a révélé une augmentation des nutriments dans ces deux lacs. L'installation de traitement des eaux usées de Halifax Water, située dans le parc Aerotech, alimente le lac Soldiers. Voici un lien vers l'enquête. http://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/Library/328834.pdf Les graphiques et le verbiage commençant à la page 32 indiquent les problèmes liés à l'augmentation de l'ammoniac, de la chlorophylle a et du phosphore. En plus des entrées de source ponctuelle, nous configurerons des stations pour utiliser le disque Secchi lors de nos tests.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.
